prompts: Create a playful water-type Pokemon with big ears and a round body for kids to love.
I want a cute, blue Pokemon that can swim and play in the ocean waves.
Generate a friendly Pokemon with a bubbly personality and a love for adventure.
Make a water fairy Pokemon with distinctive round features and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a charming Pokemon with large ears that loves to splash around in lakes.
Design a small aquatic creature that can fit into any family of trainers.
Give me an adorable Pokemon that brings joy and happiness wherever it goes.
